title: Second 'SpongeBob' Movie Is A Nonsensical, Loud, Choppy Triumph
teaser: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water is visually an eyesore â€” a kaleidoscope of bright, mismatched colors, and in 3-D to make your headache stronger. The movie makers hit the bull's-eye.
